title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
### Product Listing: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra

**Product Name:** Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra

---

#### Key Features:

- **Sizes:** Available in a range from **32C to 50DD** to accommodate a variety of plus-size figures.
- **Adjustable Straps:** Featuring front-adjustable straps for a customizable fit.
- **Material Composition:** Made from **90% nylon and 10% spandex**, providing a blend of strength and flexibility.
- **Pattern and Colors:** Leopard print with accents in **white, nude, and other colors**.
- **Full Coverage:** Ensures complete coverage for added confidence.
- **Wireless Support:** Equipped with a wide band and rows of hook and eye closures for comfortable, wireless support.
- **Pack Contents:** Comes with **1 satin bra** included in the pack.
- **Comfort and Fit:** Designed to fit comfortably and provide support without the hassle of wires.

---

#### Specifications:

- **Minimum Size:** 32C
- **Maximum Size:** 50DD
- **Adjustable Straps Location:** Front
- **Material Composition:** 90% nylon, 10% spandex
- **Pack Includes:** 1 satin bra
- **Coverage:** Full
- **Support Features:** Wireless with wide band and hook and eye closures

---

### Why Choose Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack?

- **Versatile Fit:** Perfect for a wide range of body types, from 32C to 50DD.
- **Comfortable Wear:** Front-adjustable straps ensure a comfortable fit throughout the day.
- **Elegant Design:** Leopard satin with accents in white and nude for a stylish yet comfortable look.
- **Full Coverage:** Provides complete coverage for added confidence.
- **Wireless Comfort:** Enjoy the comfort of a wireless bra without sacrificing support.
- **Quality Materials:** Made from high-quality nylon and spandex for durability and comfort.

---

**Condition:** New
**Availability:** In Stock
**Delivery:** Free shipping on orders over $50 (USA only)

---

Experience the perfect blend of style and comfort with the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, designed specifically for plus-size women who prioritize both fit and fashion.
